text: ai eemaan laanevaalo! allaah kee aagya ka paalan karo aur rasool ka kahana maano aur unaka bhee kahana maano jo tumamen adhikaaree log hai. phir yadi tumhaare beech kisee maamale mein jhagada ho jae, to use tum allaah aur rasool kee or lautao, yadi tum allaah aur antim din par eemaan rakhate ho. yadi uttam hai aur parinaam kee spasht se bhee achchha hai
